Posts.Content: bcsurvivor2b wrote: I had a single mastectomy with 2 sentinel nodes removed on 1/30/09.  My drain was removed on 2/5/09.   I was told I would feel "boggy" in the breast area.  Has anyone had this?  How long did it take to dissipate?  Thanks :) "Be good to yourself" Dx 1/12/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mastectomy "bogginess" bcsurvivor2b barbe1958
